overview: Jordan is the pretty new girl in school, who begins a relationship with Matt. Little does she know, however, that Matt has been having a steamy affair with his chemistry teacher and she's possessive of her boy toy. When Matt tries to break it off with the teacher, jealousy turns to blind rage. Is what happens next an accident, a mistake orâ€¦a crime of passion?
tagline: It's not nice to mess with teacher...
title: Crime of Passion
